title: <gradient-button>
intro:
The challenge was to create a rounded button with transparent background, gradient border and gradient text, which on hover fills the background with the gradient and switches the text to a solid color.

I couldn't find any CSS-only solution to get the precise effect I was looking for, so I threw in some JavaScript-generated SVG mask (used for the border) to do the trick.

I also have a partial CSS-only solution, but it doesn't have rounded corners.
